title: Naturopathic Treatment Modalities - Florida Naturopathic Physicians Association
author: Admin
cleaned_text: Lifestyle Counseling Naturopathic physicians possess in-depth understanding of the relationship between emotional states, health and illness. NDs are formally trained in lifestyle counseling to assess, recognize, understand and provide appropriate treatment options for behavioral issues that interfere with a patient's health and wellbeing. They might use counseling strategies, hypnotherapy, meditation, biofeedback, and other stress management techniques. Where necessary, NDs will refer patients to other health practitioners with expertise in behavioral health.
